impactDescription:
Helping the OP Stack, and Superchain product, become the de-facto standard for layer 2 development through:
- Improving the core software and identifying areas of high leverage product improvements
- Building out the developer ecosystem for production-ready integrations (blockscout, superbridge, tenderly, dune, etc.)
- Personally onboarding chains onto the Superchain, helping customer navigate the technical and business maze of launching a new rollup
- Educating and marketing information related to rollups, the superchain, and more to drive demand for the product
contributionDescription:
Working with the Optimism Collective on the Superchain vision and building the market from 0 -> 1.

Contributions include but not limited to:
- Educating developers and the broader ecosystem about rollup technology
- Educating superchain customers about the product offering, tradeoffs, and how to build a successful chain
- Gathering customer feedback and identifying high leverage areas for product improvement for the superchain product
- Helping to build developer ecosystem around the OP Stack with Conduit's integrations (blockscout, superbridge, tenderly, dune, etc.)
- Working with the core devs to improve the underlying infrastructure
- Generally, bringing more chains onto the Superchain

contributionLinks.description: Conduit Elector, an HA sequencing technology for Conduit OP Chains
Hosting free public RPC endpoints for OP Chains (like Zora)
Conduit Integrations for facilitating broader ecosystem development
Educational thread on rollup gas tokens
Educational thread on alt da layers for rollups
Marketing for Aevo, OP Stack fork
Marketing for Zora, first OP Chain on Mainnet
Superbridge app native integration with Conduit
